document.title: EiffelCOM Wizard Guided Tour
document.paragraph:
1EiffelCOM Wizard Guided Tour
This chapter explains how to use the EiffelCOM wizard to create COM components and to access existing components. See:
01_new_from_com.xml Creating a new COMcomponent .
02_new_from_eiffel.xml Creating a new component from an Eiffel Project.
03_accessing.xml Accessing a COM component.
../01_introduction.xml Introduction
../reference/index.xml EiffelCOM wizard reference
